thread.title: Bill Clinton: Trump attacks on Hillary Clinton 'fact-free'
thread.title_full: Bill Clinton: Trump attacks on Hillary Clinton 'fact-free' | News24

author: news24.com
title: Bill Clinton: Trump attacks on Hillary Clinton 'fact-free'
text:
Washington - Former president Bill Clinton said on Tuesday that Donald Trump's attacks on his wife are "fact-free" and that presidential candidates "shouldn't be able to insult [their] way to the White House."
Clinton was asked by CNN's Erin Burnett about Trump's claims that HillaryClinton, the front-runner for the Democratic presidential nomination, was "perhaps the worst secretary of state in history."
The former president responded by praising his wife's work on Iran, nuclear proliferation and Aids prevention and said that if Trump wins the Republican presidential nomination, "he'll have to sort of hone his criticisms a little more finely because the facts will be easy to marshal."
Clinton said he thought Trump and some of the other Republican candidates "believe that authenticity is created by making your campaign look as much like a reality TV show as possible."
